verses.verse: Brothers, <WG80> if <WG1437> a man <WG444> be overtaken <WG4301> in a fault, <WG3900> you which <WG3588> are spiritual, <WG4152> restore <WG2675> such <WG5108> an one in the spirit <WG4151> of meekness; <WG4236> considering <WG4648> yourself, <WG4572> lest <WG3361> you also <WG2532> be tempted. <WG3985>
Bear <WG941> you one <WG240> another's <WG240> burdens, <WG922> and so <WG3779> fulfill <WG378> the law <WG3551> of Christ. <WG5547>
For if <WG1487> a man <WG5100> think <WG1380> himself to be something, <WG5100> when he is nothing, <WG3367> he deceives <WG5422> himself. <WG1438>

But let every <WG1538> man <WG5100> prove <WG1381> his own <WG1438> work, <WG2041> and then <WG5119> shall he have <WG2192> rejoicing <WG2745> in himself <WG1438> alone, <WG3441> and not in another. <WG2087>
For every <WG1538> man <WG5100> shall bear <WG941> his own <WG2398> burden. <WG5413>
Let him that is taught <WG2727> in the word <WG4487> communicate <WG2841> to him that teaches <WG2727> in all <WG3956> good <WG18> things.
Be not deceived; <WG4105> God <WG2316> is not mocked: <WG3456> for whatever <WG3739> <WG1437> a man <WG444> sows, <WG4687> that shall he also <WG2532> reap. <WG2325>

For he that sows <WG4687> to his flesh <WG4561> shall of the flesh <WG4561> reap <WG2325> corruption; <WG5356> but he that sows <WG4687> to the Spirit <WG4151> shall of the Spirit <WG4151> reap <WG2325> life <WG2222> everlasting. <WG166>
And let us not be weary <WG1573> in well <WG2570> doing: <WG4160> for in due <WG2398> season <WG2540> we shall reap, <WG2325> if we faint <WG1590> not.

As we have <WG2192> therefore <WG685> <WG3767> opportunity, <WG2540> let us do <WG2038> good <WG18> to all <WG3956> men, especially <WG3122> to them who are of the household <WG3609> of faith. <WG4102>
You see <WG1492> how <WG4080> large <WG4080> a letter <WG1121> I have <WG2192> written <WG1125> to you with my <WG1699> own hand. <WG5495>

As many <WG3745> as desire <WG2309> to make <WG2146> a fair <WG2146> show <WG2146> in the flesh, <WG4561> they constrain <WG315> you to be circumcised; <WG4059> only <WG3440> lest <WG2443> <WG3361> they should suffer <WG1377> persecution <WG1377> for the cross <WG4716> of Christ. <WG5547>

For neither <WG3761> they themselves <WG846> who are circumcised <WG4059> keep <WG5442> the law; <WG3551> but desire <WG2309> to have you circumcised, <WG4059> that they may glory <WG2744> in your <WG5212> flesh. <WG4561>

But God <WG3361> <WG1096> forbid <WG3361> <WG1096> that I should glory, <WG2744> save <WG1508> in the cross <WG4716> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> by whom <WG3739> the world <WG2889> is crucified <WG4717> to me, and I to the world. <WG2889>
For in Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> neither <WG3777> circumcision <WG4061> avails <WG2480> any <WG5100> thing, nor <WG3777> uncircumcision, <WG203> but a new <WG2537> creature. <WG2937>
And as many <WG3745> as walk <WG4748> according to this <WG5129> rule, <WG2583> peace <WG1515> be on <WG1909> them, and mercy, <WG1656> and on the Israel <WG2474> of God. <WG2316>
From now on <WG3063> let no <WG3367> man <WG3367> trouble <WG2873> <WG3930> me: for I bear <WG941> in my body <WG4983> the marks <WG4742> of the Lord <WG2962> Jesus. <WG2424>
Brothers, <WG80> the grace <WG5485> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with your <WG5212> spirit. <WG4151> Amen. <WG281> To the Galatians written from Rome.
